attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: JUST HORRIBLE!! i open the app and see this big wrinkly orange on my screen and i threw up all over my phone! 🤢🤢 0/10 would NOT recommend!!

attributes.title: would rate 0 stars if i could
attributes.review: this app is by far one of the worst apps i have ever downloaded. not only was i bombarded by a number or chips working out and sweating, i also had to bear through never ending ads for beat blade. ridiculous. hate this app. ruining my phone with a virus too.

attributes.title: Hypocrisy 🙄
attributes.review: I was surprised to open the app and find a known racist holding up the symbol for black lives matter. This is absolutely a disappointment an disgraceful. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app I’ve ever downloaded and I’m not being dramatic. This application should not even be downloadable. Terrible absolutely terrible! Awful

attributes.title: It’s literally just racist Cheeto ads
attributes.review: I started the app and it’s literally been only showing me wildly racist ads for Cheetos? I can’t believe Chester Cheetah would endorse this.

attributes.title: No ❤️🙈
attributes.review: This app has caused me to question my sexuality. I can’t handle looking at that large juicy delicious Cheeto, I get too excited!! The devil is in this app giving me sinful thoughts!! Unacceptable!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what’s going on with Cheeto man and I open the page and see him barfing 😰 that was very traumatic

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review:
Disgusting orange man made me feel VERY uncomfortable. Beady little eyes. No lips. How will he get a kiss-kiss? And WHAT a cheep wig!!

App glitches and iPhone gave me a a dozen random warnings. Deleted immediately. 0/10

attributes.title: Baby daddy left!!
attributes.review: I met this Cheeto looking guy and I thought I was going to be happy. Then, after telling him I got PREGNANT with HIS CHILD he just up and left!! I can’t even- worst dating app EVER 😭

attributes.title: Disgusting and sad 🤢🤮
attributes.review: All you trump supporters and disgusting supporting this pedo and racist carrot this app doesn’t support the right person and needs to be taken down immediately 😤  but STAN BTS OT7 💜 gen z forever 💋
